title: FJ Drive: Mercedes-Benz Lease
description:
The Nation’s #1 Mercedes-Benz Center is now mobile!
FJ Drive makes it easy for you to secure a car loan or lease anytime, anywhere. Choose your favorite Mercedes-Benz and select inventory from your favorite Fletcher Jones dealership, apply for financing directly in the app and receive a credit decision within minutes!
Apply for a car loan or lease:
-       Browse the Nation’s largest selection of new Mercedes-Benz Inventory
-       Select any new Mercedes-Benz – down to the year, class, model and VIN
-	Select from 1 of 9 Fletcher Jones Mercedes-Benz dealerships across the nation
-	Customize a loan or lease that’s right for you and apply for credit
-	Receive your credit decision from Mercedes-Benz Financial Services within minutes
-	Close the deal and drive off the lot, confident you have a fair deal
Car Loan Calculator
Look ahead with customizable payment estimates for your Mercedes-Benz. Tailor your down payment, term and miles to meet your needs! Adjust until you reach your desired payment.
Bank-Level Security
FJ Drive protects your information using advanced encryption.  We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information.
Choose from the Nation’s largest selection of Mercedes-Benz and become a Preferred Owner and enjoy exclusive Benefits, only at Fletcher Jones.  Begin your journey today.
Welcome to the future of car financing – download FJ Drive today and Experience the Fletcher Jones Difference!
